ABOUT ME
Know Me More

I'm Surya, a Web Developer

Hey there, I am KS Surya Prathap Reddy, a motivated and self-driven person. I am an optimistic guy who looks forward to every day as a chance to improve and upgrade from the current state. I believe in smart work rather than hard work and am always ready to take up any challenge which life throws at me. I am indeed fascinated and inspired by technology and its advancements happening at a quick pace, I am very curious to learn and experiment with new technologies, languages, and tools. I will always look forward to helping people in need, helping people glide through different technologies, and shaping a better human out of myself. I am an extrovert and an open-minded lad. Networking being one of my key strengths, I would love to share my thoughts and opinions with the people around me. I am also an excellent team player and would give my best every time to my team. I would like to add that, nothing is available in our comfort zone and must leap forward to achieve the milestone being everyday amplified.
